channel.description: Recent content in stock art on Konigi

item.title: 25 Awesome Stock Texture and Photo Websites
item.description: Design Reviver has collected links for 25 great stock texture and photo site. http://designreviver.com/freebies/25-awesome-stock-texture-and-photo-websites

item.title: Free Vector World Maps Collection
item.description: If you're ever in need of a vector drawing of a world map, Web Resources Depot put together a list of links to maps you can find for free. Via swissmiss http://www.webresourcesdepot.com/free-vector-world-maps-collection/3

item.title: Stockvault.net
item.description: Stockvault.net provides an alternative to royalty free stock art vendors, by providing a user contributed archive of free photos and images. http://www.stockvault.net/
